subanswer.text:

\[ \text{Volume} = \text{Surface Area} \times \text{Average Depth} \]
\[ \text{Volume} = 438,280 \, \text{km}^2 \times 1,205 \, \text{m} \]

Since \(1 \, \text{km}^2 = 1,000,000 \, \text{m}^2\), converting units gives us:

\[ \text{Volume} = 438,280 \times 1,205 \times 1,000,000 \, \text{m}^3 \]
\[ \text{Volume} \approx 5.27 \times 10^{11} \, \text{m}^3 \]
